title: cant login in client
body: it was working fine yesterday but today when i tried to get in its not letting me in. the client is stuck at authenticating phase and then its says cant connect to server,help!!!

replies.body: Guess I'm in the same boat.

Issue is still ongoing cant login stuck at authenticating, when i switch to my mobile hotspot it goes away, the cleint is then usable while using the mobile hotspot but as soon i switch to my wifi it disconnects and wont reconnect until i switch back to mu hotspot. Although in game my wifi works.

It sounds like your network in this case is having trouble getting through to the authentication server.  You should go over the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot.  Download the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) as well, which can help auto configure your firewall settings and fix any blocks.  I hope that helps!
Same problem here, can't login. I did managed to login few mins ago but couldn't click on play button or receive match invites from friends.
I don't currently see any issues logging into EU regions, but I see a few reports over the last few hours.  Is this still an issue?
